page.title: 07VIEWS ON THE BYPASS.
page.content: Only houses directly next to the bypass will receive compensation but all the local residents will be affected by the bypass as{Thorpe Lane is to become a cul_de_sac, stopping the existing bus route to the local school and surrounding villages, and as many of the residents of Thorpe Lane are retired, walking the extra mile to the bus stop will be difficult, and some say{"hopeless". No housing has had to be sold but several land owners, including Pennels Garden Centre have suffered, although most of the road runs through disused quarries. The majority of people do not think the bypass will bring more people to Thorpe, and it will deter people from buying houses in the area.It is considered by most{a necessary evil!
